title: Ep. 1029 - Frantic, Desperate Media Tries To Defend Vanderbilt
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm 

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the media has been forced against its will to report on the Vanderbilt scandal. But their reporting has been less than honest. We have two especially egregious examples today. Also, as a hurricane bears down on Florida, Amy Klobuchar says that it could be stopped by electing Democrats. Even though Democrats are currently in charge and hurricanes are still happening. And an elderly pro-life volunteer is shot while canvassing a neighborhood. This is just a few days after a crazed leftist ran over and killed someone because he was a “Republican extremist.” In our Daily cancellation, Salon is having second thoughts about the gender neutral term “Latinx.”

- - -
